description:
The 2016 People's Choice Awards will kick off award season Jan. 6, and the nominees are in! Jane Lynch is hosting this year's ceremony, which is packed with talented nominees. In addition to Lynch, Betsy Brandt, Marcia Gay Harden, Abigail Spencer, Zachary Levi, Christina Milian, and Mark Burnett were on hand at the Paley Center for Media to make the announcement. We're already excited to see some of our favorite things and people, like Pretty Little Liars, Jurassic World, and Ed Sheeran, up for awards. After 72 million votes, here are all the nominees! 2016年美国人民选择奖颁奖典礼将于1月6日开幕，各项提名已经揭晓！ 简·林奇将主持此次仪式，众星云集。除林奇之外， 贝琪·勃兰特、马西娅·盖伊·哈登、阿比盖尔·斯宾赛、扎卡里·列维、克里斯蒂娜·米兰、马克·伯内特也都将到场于佩利媒体中心宣布获奖名单。我们已经迫不及待地看到我们喜欢的《美少女的谎言》、《侏罗纪世界》和艾德·希兰等电影、明星上台领奖了。在经过7200万的投票之后，提名名单新鲜出炉！

Take note: there's a new "Digital" category for awards like favorite social media star.注意：2016年新增了“最喜欢的社交媒体明星”的“数码”奖项。
